original_text: He called the name of that place Bethel, but the name of the city was Luz at the first.
korean_text: 그 곳 이름을 벧엘이라 하였더라 이 성의 옛 이름은 루스더라

sentences.original_text: He called the name of that place Bethel
but the name of the city was Luz at the first.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 도시의 이름은 본래 루즈였다
